summary: Completed Himalaya dual-account email configuration (Gmail + Protonmail). Restored Gmail sync (2054 emails), added logos account to Neovim plugin, updated documentation.

completion_data.completion_summary: Completed Himalaya email configuration for dual accounts (Gmail and Protonmail/Logos). Fixed stale home-manager config, synced 2054 Gmail emails, added logos account to Neovim plugin with switch_account functionality, updated all documentation.
